Fresh burrata cheese on arugula and cherry tomatoes, creamy and indulgent. Vegetarian
Romaine lettuce, garlic croutons, parmesan and homemade dressing, a timeless favorite. Vegetarian
Layered of baked eggplant unite with gooey mozzarella, basil and rich tomato sauce, creating a comforting stack of melted bliss straight from nonna's oven. Vegetarian
Grilled bread host silky Burrate cheese and Parma ham, elevated by a drizzle of truffle sauce, a sprinkle of salt and pepper - for bites that tease and tantalize.
Puffy fried dumplings arrive alongside Mortadella pork and soft Stracchino cheese, offering a playful contrast of crisp and creamy texture in every morsel. Vegetarian
Unfold thin of premium beef carpaccio with mushrooms flakes, black truffle cream, fresh radicchio and parmesan - a sophisticated essence of deliciousness.
Embark on a fresh adventure with mixed greens, arugula, sun-ripened cherry tomatoes, briny olives and tender artichokes in a light embrace. Vegetarian
Plunge into a steaming pot of mussels simmered in a spicy tomato broth, accompanied by garlicky bread, perfect for sopping up every fiery, briny drop. Mild
Golden-fried bites of mozzarella with melted cheese heart, paired with a drizzled marinara sauce that delivers a crispy saucy explosion of comfort. Vegetarian
Delicate artichoke muffin with eggs, milk and parmesan, draped in a molten cheese fondue that melts into every tender bite. Vegetarian
Delicate slices of fresh Salmon with black olive, cherry tomato pesto, EVO, and a bright lemon dressing a refreshing oceanic prelude.
Nonna's tender beef meatballs, kissed with eggs, parmesan, breadcrumbs, and milk, nestled in luscious tomato sauce - one taste, and you're family.
Delight in house-made pasta pockets filed with sweet pear and pungent gorgonzola, bathed in a caramelized leek sauce with black sesame, sweet - fusion savory. Vegetarian
Drive into layers of house-made pasta interwoven with hearty bolognese sauce, velvety bechamel, mozzarella and parmesan - baked to perfection.

Twist into house-made green cappelletti pasta stuffed with fresh ricotta and mascarpone, enveloped in a buttery parmesan sauce, infused with black truffle an earthy indulgence from heart of Italy. Vegetarian
Journey to Bologna with our green tagliatelle nestled in a hearty, slow-cooked meat rag of beef and pork rich with layers of flavor that build to an unforgettable crescendo.
Dip into wide, ribbon-like house-made pasta intertwined with tender, slow-simmered lamb rag, evoking the rustic charm of Italian hillside with every savory bite.
Awaken your sense with al dente spaghetti tossed in golden EVO, slivers of garlic, fresh parsley and Calabria spicy peperoncino- bold simplicity. Vegetarian Mild

Experience our house-crafted ravioli, generously stuffed with lobster and bathed in a vibrant, tomato sauce that bursts with seaside flavors, a coastal luxury.

Savor petite house-made ravioli parcels filled with braised beef, enveloped in a velvety creamy cheese fondue laced with the aroma of truffle sauce, a hidden gem from Piedmonts culinary treasure. Vegetarian

menu.description: The rare hybrid rice grain, Koshitanrei, is polished to 40% of its original size to produce this premium sake. Elegant floral flavors of orange blossom, elderflower, and white tea are found in this powerful genshu, or undiluted sake. Bottle 24 oz

The most sought-after rice grain, Yamada Nishiki, is polished to 35% of its original size to produce this premium sake. The sake is extracted through a slow drip process that highlights delicate flavors of lychee, honeydew and pear. Fruit forward and amazingly smooth. Bottle 24 oz

menu.item_name: DAIGINJO YK35 SHIZUKU JUKUSEI KOSHU Sake
menu.description: This is the YK35 Shizuku, aged for three years. The aging process has added structure to the delicate nashi pear flavor becoming highly complex with a deep richness not found in young sake. This is made in extremely limited quantities. Bottle 60 oz

Doradas y crujientes por fuera, con un relleno cremoso y sabroso de bacalao salado que se funde en el paladar con un delicado toque marino. Golden and crispy on the outside, with a creamy, savory filling of salted cod that melts on the palate with a delicate touch of the sea.

menu.item_name: Croquetas de Jamn y Chorizo / Ham & Chorizo Croquettes
menu.description: Crujientes por fuera, estas croquetas revelan un relleno sedoso lleno de la intensidad ahumada del chorizo y la riqueza sabrosa del jamn, dejando un clido y persistente toque picante en el paladar. Crisp on the outside, these croquettes reveal a silky filling bursting with the smoky depth of chorizo and the savory richness of jamn, leaving a warm, lingering spice on the palate.

Ligeramente crujientes por fuera, con un centro cremoso y delicioso que libera el aroma a nuez y mantequilla del Manchego aejo, con un final suave y sabroso en el paladar. Lightly crisp on the outside, with a luscious, creamy center that releases the nutty, buttery aroma of aged Manchego, leaving a smooth and savory finish on the palate.

menu.item_name: Hummus con Zanahorias Baby y Chips de Pita / Hummus with Baby Carrots & Pita Chips
menu.description: Hummus suave y aterciopelado, rico en garbanzos terrosos y un toque de limn, acompaado de la dulzura crujiente de zanahorias baby y la textura satisfactoria de chips de pita tibios. Smooth and velvety hummus, rich with earthy chickpeas and a hint of tangy lemon, paired with the crisp sweetness of baby carrots and the satisfying crunch of warm pita chips.

menu.item_name: Guacamole La Rosa con Queso a la Parrilla / Guacamole La Rosa with Grilled Cheese
menu.description: Guacamole cremoso y ctrico con lima fresca y cilantro, perfectamente acompaado de queso a la parrilla dorado y fundido que aporta un toque ahumado y rico en cada bocado. Creamy, zesty guacamole bursting with fresh lime and cilantro, perfectly paired with warm, golden grilled cheese that adds a smoky, melty richness to every bite.

Guacamole sedoso con jugosa picanha a la brasa, combinando frescura cremosa con una riqueza ahumada y sabrosa que perdura en el paladar. Silky guacamole layered with juicy, flame-kissed picanha, blending creamy freshness with a smoky, savory richness that lingers on the palate.

menu.item_name: Coliflor a la Parrilla con Hummus y Pesto / Grilled Cauliflower with Hummus & Pesto
menu.description: Coliflor asada a la perfeccin, tierna y ahumada, acompaada de hummus cremoso y un estallido aromtico de pesto fresco. Charred to perfection, tender cauliflower meets the earthy creaminess of hummus and the vibrant, aromatic burst of fresh pesto.

menu.item_name: Dip de Espinaca y Alcachofa / Spinach & Artichoke Dip
menu.description: Mezcla clida y aterciopelada de espinaca tierna y alcachofas cidas, fundidas en queso cremoso para un bocado rico y reconfortante. A warm, velvety blend of tender spinach and tangy artichokes, folded into creamy cheese for a rich, indulgent bite with every scoop.

Delicado branzino curado en ctricos, con frescura vibrante y un sutil dulzor marino que despierta el paladar. Delicate branzino cured in citrus, with a bright, zesty freshness and a subtle oceanic sweetness that awakens the palate.

Lminas finsimas de res tierna que se deshacen en la boca, enriquecidas con un toque de aceite de oliva y un susurro de especias. Paper-thin slices of tender beef melt on the tongue, enriched with a drizzle of olive oil and a whisper of spice.

Salmn estilo sashimi baado en una salsa ctrica, suave, vibrante y refrescante en cada bocado. Sashimi-style salmon draped in a tangy citrus sauce, smooth and vibrant with every refreshing bite. Buttery salmon with a silky texture, balanced by fresh citrus and a touch of herbal brightness.

menu.item_name: Tortilla Espaola (Clsica o con Chorizo) / Spanish Tortilla (Plain or with Chorizo)
menu.description: Capas esponjosas de papa y huevo, doradas y reconfortantes, con opcin de chorizo ahumado para un extra de sabor. Fluffy layers of potato and egg, comforting and golden, with the option of smoky chorizo for an extra savory depth.

Seleccin artesanal de embutidos y quesos curados, en perfecta armona de texturas, aromas y sabores intensos. An artisanal selection of cured meats and cheeses, offering a perfect harmony of textures, aromas, and bold, lingering flavors.

menu.item_name: La Rosa Sanda / La Rosa Watermelon
menu.description: Sanda jugosa con rcula picante y queso feta cremoso, fresca y brillante. Juicy watermelon with peppery arugula and creamy feta, refreshing and bright.
Crujiente lechuga romana con aderezo Csar cremoso y un toque crocante. Crisp romaine tossed in creamy Caesar dressing with a savory crunch.
Burrata aterciopelada con tomates heirloom, rcula, pesto y glaseado balsmico dulce. Velvety burrata with heirloom tomatoes, arugula, pesto, and a sweet balsamic glaze.

menu.item_name: Ensalada Thai Picada / Chop Thai Salad
menu.description: Verduras y hojas frescas con aderezo agridulce de inspiracin tailandesa. Crisp vegetables and greens with a tangy-sweet Thai-inspired dressing.

menu.item_name: Ensalada de Pollo BBQ / BBQ Chicken Salad
menu.description: Pollo a la parrilla ahumado sobre hojas frescas, con intensos sabores de barbacoa dulce. Smoky grilled chicken over fresh greens with bold, sweet barbecue flavors.
Pollo, arroz, aguacate, frijoles, maz rostizado y totopos con aderezo de cilantro. A hearty mix of chicken, rice, avocado, beans, roasted corn, and tortilla chips with zesty cilantro dressing.

Cerdo deshebrado con arroz, pltanos maduros, aguacate, frijoles y jitomate fresco en aderezo de cilantro. Savory pulled pork layered with rice, sweet plantains, avocado, beans, and fresh tomato in cilantro dressing.
Salmn a la parrilla sobre arroz y hojas frescas con aguacate y toppings vibrantes. Grilled salmon over rice and greens with avocado and fresh, vibrant toppings.

menu.item_name: Bowl de Atn Picante / Spicy Tuna Bowl
menu.description: Atn con arroz, vegetales crujientes y un toque picante en cada bocado. Zesty tuna with rice, crisp vegetables, and a spicy kick in every bite.

menu.item_name: Filete Mignon Prime al Fuego / Prime Filet Mignon on Fire
menu.description: Tierno filete mignon flameado sobre sal del Himalaya para un acabado ahumado y mantequilloso. Tender filet mignon flame-grilled over Himalayan salt for a smoky, buttery finish.

menu.item_name: Picanha Prime al Fuego / Prime Picanha on Fire
menu.description: Jugosa picanha sellada sobre sal del Himalaya, rica en sabor intenso. Juicy picanha seared over Himalayan salt, rich with bold, savory flavor.

menu.item_name: Tomahawk Prime al Fuego / Prime Tomahawk on Fire
menu.description: Corte Tomahawk flameado sobre sal del Himalaya con sabor profundo y robusto. Impressive tomahawk steak, flame-kissed on Himalayan salt with deep, robust taste.

menu.item_name: Filete Mignon Prime La Rosa / Prime Filet Mignon La Rosa
menu.description: Filete jugoso, a la parrilla a la perfeccin con sabor refinado. Melt-in-your-mouth filet, grilled to perfection with refined, delicate flavor.

menu.item_name: Picanha Prime La Rosa / Prime Picanha La Rosa
menu.description: Corte clsico de picanha, jugoso y lleno de sabor. Classic picanha cut, juicy and flavorful with every tender bite.

menu.item_name: Costillas La Rosa / La Rosa Ribs
menu.description: Costillas a la parrilla, ahumadas y tiernas con glaseado dulce y salado. Slow-grilled ribs, smoky and succulent with a sweet, savory glaze.

menu.item_name: Salmn a la Parrilla / Grilled Salmon
menu.description: Salmn sellado al fuego, tierno y mantequilloso con un toque ctrico. Flame-seared salmon, tender and buttery with a hint of citrus brightness.

menu.item_name: Pulpo a la Parrilla / Grilled Octopus
menu.description: Pulpo asado, tierno y ahumado con delicada esencia marina. Charred octopus, smoky and tender with a delicate ocean essence.
Camarones salteados en mantequilla de ajo con un toque de limn. Plump shrimp sauted in garlic butter, vibrant with a splash of lemon.
Carne tierna con la riqueza del mar. A perfect surf and turf, combining tender steak with buttery seafood richness.
Branzino ligero y escamoso, a la parrilla con sabor fresco. Light and flaky branzino, grilled with a clean, fresh ocean flavor.

menu.item_name: Pollo Margarita a la Parrilla / Grill Chicken Margherita
menu.description: Pechuga de pollo jugosa con jitomate fresco, mozzarella y albahaca. Juicy grilled chicken topped with fresh tomato, mozzarella, and basil.
Mezcla fresca de hojas verdes con un toque crujiente y refrescante. Crisp mixed greens with a light, refreshing crunch.
Cremoso aguacate con lima y hierbas frescas. Creamy avocado with zesty lime and fresh herbs.

menu.item_name: Verduras a la Parrilla / Grilled Vegetables
menu.description: Verduras de temporada asadas con un sabor ahumado y tierno. Charred seasonal vegetables with smoky, tender flavor.
Pimientos salteados, suaves y sabrosos con un leve toque picante. Blistered peppers, mild and savory with a hint of heat.
Papas doradas y crujientes al horno con romero aromtico. Golden potatoes roasted crisp with aromatic rosemary.
Coliflor tierna con una costra de parmesano. Tender cauliflower with a nutty Parmesan crust.
Arroz esponjoso y fragante con un delicado aroma a mantequilla. Fluffy, fragrant rice with a delicate buttery aroma.

menu.item_name: Papas Fritas de Camote / Sweet Potato Fries
menu.description: Crujientes papas de camote con un final dulce y acaramelado. Crispy fries with a sweet, caramelized finish.
Doradas y crujientes con un centro ligero y suave. Golden and crunchy with a light, fluffy center.
Cerdo cocinado lentamente, jugoso y tierno con un acabado ahumado-dulce. Slow-cooked pork, tender and juicy with a smoky-sweet finish.

menu.item_name: Taco de Pulpo Asado / Grilled Octopus Taco
menu.description: Pulpo asado, ahumado y tierno con un bocado marino delicado. Charred octopus, smoky and tender with a delicate ocean bite.
Res a la parrilla, jugosa y sabrosa con sabor intenso. Grilled steak, savory and succulent with bold, meaty flavor.

menu.item_name: Taco de Coliflor al Chipotle / Chipotle Cauliflower Taco
menu.description: Coliflor rostizada con un toque ahumado de chipotle y un toque dulce. Roasted cauliflower with smoky chipotle heat and a hint of sweetness.

menu.item_name: Agregar Queso Fundido / Add Melted Cheese
menu.description: Queso derretido, cremoso y con un sabor indulgente. Warm, gooey cheese with a rich, indulgent touch.
Pasta en salsa cremosa de vodka y jitomate con albahaca fragante. Pasta tossed in creamy vodka-tomato sauce with fragrant basil.

menu.item_name: Pasta Cremosa de Limn / Creamy Lemon Pasta
menu.description: Salsa de limn cremosa con pollo tierno y parmesano. Silky lemon cream sauce with tender chicken and Parmesan.

menu.item_name: Pasta de Mariscos (Vino Blanco o Salsa Roja) / Seafood Pasta (White Wine or Red Sauce)
menu.description: Calamares, camarones, mejillones y almejas en un rico festn marino. Calamari, shrimp, mussels, and clams in a rich, coastal medley.
Opcin ligera y saludable de pasta sin gluten.

menu.item_name: oquis de Queso Crema con Salsa de Championes / Cream Cheese Gnocchi with Mushroom Sauce
menu.description: oquis suaves en salsa aterciopelada de championes, reconfortante y terrosa. Pillowy gnocchi in velvety mushroom sauce, earthy and comforting.

menu.item_name: oquis de Queso Crema con Salsa de Langosta / Cream Cheese Gnocchi with Lobster Sauce
menu.description: oquis suaves en salsa aterciopelada de championes, reconfortante y terrosa. Pillowy gnocchi in velvety mushroom sauce, earthy and comforting.
Pechuga de pollo a la parrilla con queso suizo y championes salteados. Grilled chicken breast with Swiss cheese and savory mushrooms.
Jugosa carne Angus 8 oz con gouda, aguacate y rcula fresca. Juicy 8 oz Angus patty with gouda, avocado, and fresh arugula.
Carne de 8 oz con queso suizo y cebolla caramelizada. 8 oz burger layered with Swiss cheese and caramelized onions.

menu.item_name: Hamburguesa de Cerdo Deshebrado / Pulled Pork Burger
menu.description: Cerdo cocinado lentamente, ahumado y lleno de sabor. Slow-braised pork, smoky, tender, and rich in flavor.

menu.item_name: Hamburguesa de Salmn con Miel y Sriracha / Honey Sriracha Salmon Burger
menu.description: Filete de salmn con glaseado dulce de miel y toque picante de sriracha. Flaky salmon patty glazed with sweet honey and spicy sriracha heat.
Pan dorado con queso derretido y cremoso en su interior. Golden, buttery bread with gooey melted cheese inside
Hamburguesa de res con queso fundido en pan suave. Juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese on a soft bun.
Pasta tierna con salsa de jitomate y albahaca fresca. Tender pasta with tomato sauce and fresh basil, simple and comforting.

menu.item_name: Cheesecake La Rosa / La Rosa Cheesecake
menu.description: Pastel de queso rico y cremoso con un final aterciopelado. Rich and creamy cheesecake with a smooth, velvety finish.
Mousse ligero y decadente con textura sedosa. Airy chocolate mousse, decadent and silky with every spoonful.
Churros dorados y crujientes con azcar, tibios y dulces. Crispy golden churros dusted with sugar, warm and sweet.
Flan cremoso con sutil sabor a queso y caramelo. Creamy flan with a subtle cheese richness and caramel glaze.
Flan sedoso con dulzor tropical de coco y caramelo. Silky coconut flan with tropical sweetness and smooth caramel.
Flan aterciopelado con dulzura de guayaba y caramelo. Velvety flan infused with sweet guava, finished with caramel.

Tabbouleh recipe features loads of fresh parsley, mint, lemon, and bulgur wheat . Its a delicious take on the Middle Eastern herb salad.

A fresh and simple mix of diced tomatoes, cucumbers, parsley, onions, and mint, tossed in a light lemon and olive oil dressing. Crisp, healthy, and full of bright Mediterranean flavorsperfect as a starter or side dish.

A refreshing Lebanese salad made with crisp romaine lettuce, juicy tomatoes, cucumbers, radishes, and fresh herbs, all tossed in a zesty sumac-lemon dressing. Topped with crunchy, toasted pita chips for the perfect balance of flavor and texture. Light, healthy, and full of Mediterranean goodness!

A rich and smoky blend of roasted red peppers, walnuts, olive oil, and a touch of pomegranate molasses, seasoned with warm spices for a sweet, tangy, and slightly spicy kick. Served with pita bread, this vibrant dip is a true taste of the Mediterranean.
Choice of 3 dips (Hummus, Baba Ghanoush, Muhamara, Labne)

Creamy, tangy, and ultra-smooth strained yogurt drizzled with extra virgin olive oil and sprinkled with zaatar. Served with warm pita bread, its a light and refreshing dip thats perfect as a starter or side to any meal.

A silky blend of chickpeas, tahini, fresh lemon juice, and garlic, whipped to creamy perfection and drizzled with extra virgin olive oil. Served with warm pita bread, this timeless Mediterranean favorite is smooth, flavorful, and naturally vegan.

A rich, fluffy, and velvety garlic sauce made with fresh garlic, lemon juice, and oil, whipped to perfection. Bursting with bold flavor, its the perfect dip or spread to elevate grilled meats, sandwiches, or veggies.

A smoky, creamy blend of fire-roasted eggplant, tahini, fresh lemon juice, and garlic, topped with a drizzle of olive oil. Served with pita bread, this classic dip is packed with rich, earthy flavors and makes the perfect starter or side.

Creamy, smooth, and rich in flavorour classic hummus is made from perfectly blended chickpeas , tahini , lemon , and garlic , creating the ideal base for one of our signature toppings: tender, marinated beef shawarma . Slow-cooked with aromatic spices and seared to perfection, the beef adds a savory, melt-in-your-mouth finish to this beloved dish.

Creamy, smooth hummus topped with a flavorful mix of tender, marinated beef and chicken shawarma. Finished with a drizzle of olive oil and a sprinkle of spices, served with warm pita bread. A hearty and delicious combination of classic flavors in every bite!
Bulgur kibbeh stuffed with ground beef, pine nuts, home spice
Trigo, papas hervida, espinaca, pine, cebolla garbanzos y condimentos lebaneses

6 pcs of popular Latin favorite! Tequenos de Queso, Crispy, golden pastry sticks filled with warm, melted cheese and fried to perfection. Served with a side of dipping sauce for the ultimate cheesy snackperfect to share or enjoy all to yourself.

6 pieces of crispy on the outside, tender on the insideour Falafel is a true Middle Eastern classic. Made from a flavorful blend of ground chickpeas , fresh herbs , cilantro, garlic , and lebanese spices , each bite delivers a perfect balance of texture and taste.
4 pcs with fries

6 pcs BBQ, Garlic or Honey Mustard Crispy, juicy chicken wings tossed in your choice of sauceclassic buffalo, garlic parmesan, or sweet chili. Served hot and fresh with a side of ranch or blue cheese dressing. Perfect for sharing or keeping all to yourself!

Tender grape leaves stuffed with a savory blend of seasoned ground beef, rice, fresh herbs, and spices. Slowly cooked to perfection, a timeless Mediterranean favorite thats rich in flavor and tradition.

A perfect combo platter featuring three classic Mediterranean dips hummus , baba ghanoush , and labneh served with crispy, golden fried kibbeh . Fresh pita bread and pickles on the side make this an ideal starter to share or enjoy as a light meal.

Juicy, seasoned beef shawarma wrapped in warm pita bread with creamy tahini sauce, fresh tomatoes, onions, parsley, and pickles. Bursting with authentic Mediterranean spices, this flavorful wrap is served with a side of crispy fries or fresh salad for a complete meal.

Grilled, juicy kafta (seasoned ground beef and lamb) wrapped in soft pita bread with fresh parsley, onions, tomatoes, pickles, and a drizzle of tahini sauce. Bursting with authentic Lebanese flavors, this wrap is the perfect savory meal on the goserved with a side of fries or salad.
2 chicken skewers with biwaz and lavash

Crispy, golden falafel wrapped in soft pita bread with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, pickles, and turnips, all drizzled with creamy tahini sauce. A delicious, vegan option packed with authentic Mediterranean flavorperfect for a quick, healthy meal on the go!

Tender, marinated chicken shawarma sliced thin and wrapped in fresh pita bread with garlic sauce, pickles, and a touch of crispy fries inside for extra crunch. A street food favorite, packed with bold flavors and served with a side of fries or salad.

menu.description: A wholesome and satisfying bowl featuring crispy, golden falafel served over a bed of fresh greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, pickles, and turnips. Drizzled with creamy tahini sauce and served with a side of warm pita. Fully vegan and packed with vibrant Mediterranean flavorsperfect for a light lunch or dinner.

A hearty bowl loaded with tender, marinated beef and chicken shawarma , served over fragrant rice with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, pickles, and turnips. Finished with a drizzle of garlic sauce and tahini, plus a side of warm pita. A flavorful and satisfying meal that brings together the best of Mediterranean street food!

Juicy, seasoned chicken shawarma served over a bed of fluffy rice with crisp lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, pickles, and turnips. Topped with a drizzle of creamy garlic sauce and tahini, and served with warm pita on the side. A healthy, flavorful bowl packed with classic Mediterranean taste!

Tender, marinated beef shawarma layered over seasoned rice with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, pickles, and turnips. Finished with a drizzle of garlic sauce and tahini, and served with warm pita bread. A hearty, bold, and satisfying bowl full of authentic Mediterranean flavors.

Juicy, marinated beef shawarma slow-cooked with traditional spices and served over seasoned rice with fresh salad, pickles, turnips, and warm pita bread. Finished with a drizzle of tahini sauce for a bold, authentic taste of the Mediterranean. A hearty, flavorful plate perfect for any shawarma lover!

Tender, marinated chicken shawarma cooked to perfection and served over a bed of seasoned rice with fresh salad, pickles, turnips, and warm pita bread. Topped with our signature garlic sauce for a bold, authentic Mediterranean experience. A satisfying meal thats full of flavor!

The best of both worlds! A generous serving of tender, marinated chicken and beef shawarma , served over seasoned rice with fresh salad, pickles, turnips, and warm pita bread. Finished with a drizzle of garlic sauce and tahini for the perfect balance of bold, authentic Mediterranean flavors.

Grilled, juicy skewers of seasoned ground beef and lamb , blended with fresh parsley, onions, and spices. Served with fragrant rice, fresh salad, pickles, and a side of creamy garlic or tahini sauce. This hearty, authentic Lebanese dish is full of rich flavor and perfect for a complete, satisfying meal.

Crispy, golden-brown falafel made from ground chickpeas, fresh herbs, and spices. Served with a side of hummus, fresh salad, pickles, turnips, and warm pita bread. Drizzled with creamy tahini sauce for the perfect, vegan-friendly meal packed with authentic Mediterranean flavors.

Crispy, golden kibbeh shells stuffed with a flavorful mix of seasoned ground beef, onions, and pine nuts. Served with fresh salad, pickles, and your choice of creamy yogurt or tahini sauce. A traditional Lebanese favorite thats hearty, satisfying, and full of authentic flavor.

A delicious meat-free version of the classic! Crispy, golden-brown vegetarian kibbeh made with bulgur wheat, potatoes, onions, and aromatic spices. Served with fresh salad, pickles, and a side of creamy yogurt or tahini sauce. A hearty, flavorful, and vegetarian-friendly meal packed with authentic Lebanese taste.

A crispy, golden falafel patty made from seasoned chickpeas and fresh herbs, served on a soft bun with lettuce, tomato, pickles, and a generous drizzle of creamy tahini sauce. Fully vegan and bursting with Mediterranean flavor! Make it your own with optional add-ons like hummus , spicy vegan mayo , or extra fresh veggies . Served with a side of crispy fries.

Crispy, golden-fried chicken breast served on a toasted bun with fresh lettuce, juicy tomato, pickles, and your favorite sauce. Crunchy on the outside, tender on the insideserved with a side of hot, crispy fries for the perfect comfort meal.

Tender, juicy grilled chicken breast served on a soft toasted bun with crisp lettuce, ripe tomato, pickles, and your choice of sauce. Light, flavorful, and perfectly paired with a side of golden fries.
A juicy, grilled beef patty served on a toasted bun with fresh lettuce, tomato, pickles, and your choice of sauce. Paired with a side of crispy golden fries for the ultimate classic meal.
A juicy, grilled beef patty served on a toasted bun with cheese, fresh lettuce, tomato, pickles, and your choice of sauce. Paired with a side of crispy golden fries for the ultimate classic meal.

Fluffy, seasoned rice tossed with golden, toasted almonds for the perfect touch of crunch and nutty flavor. Light, aromatic, and the ideal side dish to complement any entre, from grilled meats to vegetarian favorites.
A comforting, hearty dish made with tender lentils, fluffy rice, and caramelized onions, seasoned with warm spices for rich, earthy flavor.
Bursting with tangy, salty flavors and a touch of spiceperfect for snacking or as a refreshing side to complement any meal.
A fragrant and fluffy blend of long-grain rice sauted with vermicelli noodles and lightly toasted in olive oil, then cooked to perfection in savory broth. The perfect side to complement any meal!
Crispy, golden, and perfectly seasoned fries served hot and fresh. The ultimate side dish or snackdelicious on their own or paired with your favorite dipping sauce.
